problem.ruleDescription: 3rd,5th,7th, etc. arguments must be QName strings

problem.fixMessage: Variable "output" must specify a part name.

problem.fixMessage: Specify either <{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable}toPart> *or* attribute "inputVariable" on <bpws:invoke>.

problem.ruleDescription: Check to see if toPart is specified; if so then inputVariable must not be used on the reply.

problem.fixMessage: Specify either <{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable}fromPart> *or* attribute "outputVariable" on <bpws:invoke>.
